attributes.action: repeal the law that allows the theft of taxpayers money by mps and hold them accountable to the law of the land for theft of tax payers money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
